Title: ASUS Zenfone 12 Ultra review: I really like this phone, but you shouldn't buy it
Description:
The Zenfone 12 Ultra is one of the best phones I used in 2025.
There's just one problem — I don't think you should buy it.

Title: This tiny dongle brings AptX Lossless to any phone, and it's fantastic
Description: Fiio's $44 BT11 is a Bluetooth transmitter that contains all the high-res codecs you'll ever need.

Title: Samsung might launch real Hi-Fi wireless earbuds using UWB. Here's why that is a great idea.
Description:
UWB carries a lot more data than Bluetooth, and its limitations won't affect using it for headphones.
Do it, Samsung!

Title: Why everyone suddenly wants to be seen as 'high agency'
Description: Move over, "disruptors." Everyone wants to be seen as "high agency" now.

Title: Federal resignation deadline looms. And, the implications of a USAID shutdown
Description: It's decision day for millions of federal employees who find themselves at a "fork in the road." And, the Trump administration's plans to shut down USAID could have devastating consequences worldwide.

Title: Even now, Ke Huy Quan doesn't feel good enough — but that narrative is changing
Description: The Everything, Everywhere, All at Once star says the day after he won his Oscar for the role, he woke up thinking, "Was that all a dream?"

Title: I retired early and began traveling the world with my husband. In some ways, it still feels like work.
Description: To stay grounded, the retired couple schedule a once-a-week "business meeting" to review finances, plan trips, and align on short- and long-term priorities.

Title: The workplace: A frontier for bipartisan progress

Title: Musk trolls critics and federal workers as DOGE targets US agencies
Description: As Elon Musk and his team rip through the federal government, he is doing it all with his signature trolling, mocking his critics and targets along the way.

Title: Protesters across the US rally against Trump administration policies
Description: The grassroots effort has been organized across social media sites using hashtags #buildtheresistance and #50501, calling on Americans to "fight fascism."

Title: With House GOP stuck, Senate pushes ahead with its plan to fund Trump's agenda
Description: Senate Budget chair Graham wants to plow forward on a funding package that bundles border security and defense spending as the House continues to struggle with its plan.

Title: Hitler’s Oligarchs
Description:

Then they supported and enabled him.
Then they regretted it.

Title: Elon Musk's 'Fork in the Road' Is Really a Dead End
Description: Elon Musk’s Fork in the Road isn’t just a sculpture—it’s a monument to the tech world’s obsession with civilizational survival, which has its roots in the search for extraterrestrial intelligence
